A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a BAD movie with a handful of genuinely amazing moments. The first 30 minutes or so are possibly my favorite in any Star Wars movie\, I’ll say without spoiling anything that there are some really really cool moments sprinkled here and there. But a handful of good moments do not a good movie make. The second act was such a mess\, I felt like I was watching a prequel. And that’s one of the harshest things I could ever say about a movie.
